overview: Melanie Grey is an entrepreneur who broke up with the corporate world of Engineering and started a number of online businesses. She started with Phoenix Water Filters selling stainless steel <a href="http://www.phoenixwaterfilters.com.au">water filters</a>, then an online shop for <a href="http://www.baby-prams.net.au">Baby Prams</a> and now <a href="http://www.tinytoys.com.au">kids toys</a>. Her expertise lies with search engine optimisation, web design and enjoys blogging. Most of her blogs are about health, parenting and entrepreneurialism.
